title: Is coding bootcamp for you?
post_content: Are you prepared to sacrifice your time, your life and your first born? If yes then go for it!

title: Don't get Javascript? You're not alone.
post_content: Four months in and I'm still waiting for the proverbial light from js heaven to shine upon me, stay tuned.

title: How much can a person learn in just a few months
post_content: Turns out a person can learn quite a lot under threat of failure. I can do things now that I never thought I could. Cheers to that!
